version_description:
Freeze frame supports more sensors
UI Enhancements

Major improvements in OBD connection compatibility
Added simulation ECU to allow previewing functionality
Supported sensor detection improved
Vehicle diagnostic screen added to allow viewing items such as Vehicle Identification Number (VIN)
Freeze frame bug fixes

Added emissions/sensors readiness to diagnostics
Minor formatting enhancements

Major Enhancements:

Performance section added
-Dynanometer
-1/4 Mile Run

iPhone X Compatibility


Minor Enhancements

Added option to allow forcing English language
Error code detail screen links to third party website for further details
Added code lookup feature
Gauge value overrides now allow negative numbers

Major Enhancements:

Performance section added
-Dynanometer
-1/4 Mile Run

iPhone X Compatibility


Minor Enhancements

Added option to allow forcing English language
Error code detail screen links to third party website for further details
Added code lookup feature
Gauge value overrides now allow negative numbers

=== Version 3.1.0 ===

Minor Enhancements
-Added new sensor 'Intake Manifold Boost Pressure'
-Added clarification on App's abilities for code clearing
-Simulated ECU now shown as different icon on home screen
-Added additional gauge screens

Bug Fixes
-Iphone X home bar no longer covers dyno results
-Table headers no longer become hard to read after scrolling
